name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 15, the Chinese Embassy in Tajikistan issued a statement denying that China has built a military base in Tajikistan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 15, Zhejiang. A woman posted a video saying that on July 3, a business contacted her to cooperate in shooting a short video advertisement. On July 9, when the woman arrived at the agreed location, she was taken away by several police officers. The woman questioned the police for not notifying her when summoning her, and the police said they would take a statement back to the station, but after she was searched in the station, she did not take a statement, but was detained in a room for 24 hours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 15, the Shenyang City Public Security Bureau jointly issued a notice announcing that it would severely crack down on online rumors in accordance with the law.
The public is required to refrain from forwarding screenshots, videos, audios, text and other information disseminated by online platforms without authoritative and regular sources.
Publishers, forwarders, website platform managers and other relevant personnel and units of rumor information will be dealt with in accordance with the law, and criminal liability will be pursued in serious cases.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Shanghai Stock Exchange announced that it will officially release the real-time quotes of the Shanghai Composite Total Return Index from July 29, with 3320.89 as the base point.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 15, Weinan, Shaanxi. A woman posted a video saying that she found a black workshop processing dead chickens. "The workers' hair was scabby and the stench was everywhere." Netizens commented, "Otherwise, there would be so many cases of uremia now."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 15, Weinan, Shaanxi. A woman posted a video saying that she found a black workshop processing dead chickens. "The workers' hair was scabby and the stench was everywhere."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On Xiaohongshu, university teachers and bank employees complained about being restricted from leaving the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Hong Kong Consumer Council tested 30 bottled mineral waters in the latest issue of Choice magazine, and found that the bromate content of Baishuishan and Nongfu Spring reached the EU upper limit. Large intake of bromate can cause nausea, abdominal pain, vomiting and diarrhea. On July 16, Nongfu Spring issued a lawyer's letter, pointing out three major mistakes of the Hong Kong Consumer Council and demanding a written clarification and apology from the Hong Kong Consumer Council.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 15, Guangzhou, Guangdong. Some students posted on social media platforms, complaining about the poor conditions of graduate dormitory in Jinan University.
Students said that the dormitory walls were painted without removing mold, and students were allowed to move in before the paint dried. The dormitory has various fire hazards, aging facilities, exposed wires, and the dormitory is dark and damp, with too many mosquitoes.
Jinan University ranks sixth in Hupu's "most difficult university dormitory".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 15, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. A netizen revealed that he found a rat head in his Tongyi Laotan Pickled Cabbage Noodles. The incident quickly triggered public opinion. Then a strange scene appeared. All the works of the account were cleared. What is more intriguing is that the account profile column reads: The arm cannot twist the thigh. Tongyi Foods said that it has arranged a specialist to contact the consumer, and the specific situation needs to be confirmed and verified.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 15, People's Daily: Understand the preciousness of 5%.
The article mentioned that for the world's second largest economy, it is rare and precious to be able to achieve an economic growth of about 5%. It can be seen that this 5% is a growth that has withstood the test of high winds and rough waves, and is basically in line with market expectations. The Chinese economy is still the main engine and ballast of world economic growth.......
https://t.co/jUzwDlWh6C

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 15, the National Bureau of Statistics announced that the GDP growth rate in the first quarter was faster than that of the United States, the eurozone, Japan, etc., and that my country's economic growth rate is expected to remain ahead in the first half of the year, which triggered ridicule and doubts from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 15, in Dazhu County, Sichuan, local residents posted a video saying that a sprinkler truck spilled oil, causing passers-by to fall.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/VkHXAQustj

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 16, the flood situation in Sheqi County, Henan Province. The video shows that the elderly knelt down and kowtowed to pray to God not to rain again, and some people woke up to find their beds "floating on the water". On that day, the flood control emergency response in Sheqi County was upgraded to Level I.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 15, Changchun, Jilin. A young man hangs a paper sign and looks for a job on a busy street.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 16, near Haier Mansion in Yaohai District, Hefei, the owners took to the streets tonight to protest against compensation issues caused by the flooding of the community due to the backflow of the river due to heavy rain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A Zhihu netizen asked: Is Chinese civilization the only hope for mankind to leave the blue planet?
Netizen replied: You have consumed too much mixed oil, and your brain must have been damaged. During the three-year epidemic, you couldn't even walk out of the community gate.
As of the time of posting, the question has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 16, Luohe, Henan. The culvert of the Jinshan Road overpass was flooded and some vehicles were submerged.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 15, Langfang, Hebei. The Jinle Wanjia real estate project has been unfinished for 8 years, and the helpless owners can only move in with their families in the unfinished building with no water, electricity or gas.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 13-15, Zibo, Shandong. Many villagers in Pengjia Village reported that the local government used more than 30 million yuan of land acquisition compensation for financial management without their knowledge and consent. The dissatisfied villagers went to the Petition Bureau of the Economic Development Zone and the town government to defend their rights and seek justice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The owners of Haier Smart Mansion continued to confront the police, shouting and demanding the police to release the arrested owners. A letter was issued to all owners on the spot, with the slogan "Give up illusions, prepare for struggle"
